20#include <sys/cdefs.h>
21#ifndef lint
22__RCSID("$NetBSD: print-bt.c,v 1.6 2017/02/05 04:05:05 spz Exp $");
23#endif
24
25/* \summary: Bluetooth printer */
26
27#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
28#include "config.h"
29#endif
30
31#include <netdissect-stdinc.h>
32
33#include "netdissect.h"
34#include "extract.h"
35
36#if defined(DLT_BLUETOOTH_HCI_H4_WITH_PHDR) && defined(HAVE_PCAP_BLUETOOTH_H)
37#include <pcap/bluetooth.h>
38
39#define BT_HDRLEN sizeof(pcap_bluetooth_h4_header)
40/*
41 * This is the top level routine of the printer. 'p' points
42 * to the bluetooth header of the packet, 'h->ts' is the timestamp,
43 * 'h->len' is the length of the packet off the wire, and 'h->caplen'
44 * is the number of bytes actually captured.
45 */
46u_int
47bt_if_print(netdissect_options *ndo, const struct pcap_pkthdr *h, const u_char *p)
48{
49 u_int length = h->len;
50 u_int caplen = h->caplen;
51 const pcap_bluetooth_h4_header* hdr = (const pcap_bluetooth_h4_header*)p;
52
53 if (caplen < BT_HDRLEN) {
54 ND_PRINT((ndo, "[|bt]"));
55 return (BT_HDRLEN);
56 }
57 caplen -= BT_HDRLEN;
58 length -= BT_HDRLEN;
59 p += BT_HDRLEN;
60 if (ndo->ndo_eflag)
61 ND_PRINT((ndo, "hci length %d, direction %s, ", length, (EXTRACT_32BITS(&hdr->direction)&0x1)?"in":"out"));
62
63 if (!ndo->ndo_suppress_default_print)
64 ND_DEFAULTPRINT(p, caplen);
65
66 return (BT_HDRLEN);
67}
68#endif
69
70
